Name: Central Thebes
Description: The historical and commercial heart of Thebes, home to ancient ruins and modern businesses.

Name: Thespies
Description: A historic town within Thebes, known for its connection to the Battle of Thermopylae.

Name: Plataea
Description: A district known for its role in ancient Greek warfare, particularly the Battle of Plataea.

Name: Eleonas
Description: A smaller district with a strong agricultural presence.
